div.pre: 2075 Casulla, Monte S. Basile, 15 km. W of Leontini, 1933 Burial: 470-65 B.C. (K) Contents: 40 AR. Pot hoard, prob. complete Acragas: 24 didr. Himera: 4 didr. (rev. crab) Leontini: 2 didr. Messana: 1 tetradr. (mule-car) Syracuse: 9 tetradr. (to Boehringer 324) Disposition: Syracuse Currò Pisanò AIIN 1962-4, pp. 226-7 Note that the contents as listed amount to exactly 100 dr.
